participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, enjoys hands-on activities and family time.
participant_1.background: I love my green tea set. I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs. I have a 3 year old. I have a lizard named Nagini. My favorite band is The Avett Brothers.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Artistic and active, loves to express himself through art and enjoys physical activities.
participant_2.background: I have a date with my girlfriend tonight after a long run. My mother was a famous ballet dancer in London. I have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers. I take my dog for a walk after I wake up. I exercise.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing good! How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you.  I have a 3 year old, and a lizard named Nagini.
That's awesome! I have a dog and we go for a walk every morning.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch The Repair Shop and listen to the Avett Brothers.  How about you?
I love to draw and paint.  I also like to go for runs.  I have a date with my girlfriend tonight after a long run.
That's cool!  I have a lot of fun watching my daughter dance.  She's really good at it.
That's awesome!  I wish I could dance like my mother.  She was a famous ballet dancer in London.
That's really cool!  I'm sure you're talented as well.
Thank you!  I try my best.  I'm also working on creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
That's awesome!  I wish you the best of luck with that.
